title: SUSE Combines StackState, Rancher for Kubernetes Observability
author: Chris J Preimesberger
description: This new platform provides out-of-the-box observability to development teams for all Kubernetes clusters managed by Rancher.
cntitle: SUSE 将 StackState 与 Rancher 结合，用于 Kubernetes 可观测性
cndescription: 此新平台为由 Rancher 管理的所有 Kubernetes 集群的开发团队提供开箱即用的可观察性。
